title: Farming Simulator 17 : Platinum Edition v1.5.3.1 + 6 DLC
description:
Year of manufacture: October 25, 2016. 
Genre: Simulator, 3D 
Developer: Giants Software 
Publisher: Focus Home Interactive 
Platform: PC 
Publication Type: Repack 
Language: English 
Language of voice: English 
Crack: Included (RELOADED) 

Farming Simulator 17, developed by Giants Software, invites you to try yourself as a modern farmer. Solve the problems that arise before you, engage in livestock, cereals, sales and logging. Take decisions and run a farm in a vast open world! In the course of your career growth, more than a hundred agricultural machines that faithfully repeat the most famous brands (Challenger, Fendt, Valtra, Massey Ferguson, etc.) will fall under your management. Deep and addictive gameplay, a large open world and a huge fleet of vehicles, including the newest - Farming Simulator - the most realistic farm simulator of all created! Farming Simulator 17 will be released in autumn 2016 with many new features: a new card, new brands and machines, new animals for breeding and a bunch of innovations in the gameplay, which we will talk about in the coming months. 

DLC : 

Farming Simulator 17 - Big Bud Pack 
Farming Simulator 17 - KUHN Equipment Pack 
Farming Simulator 17 - Valtra T-Series Cow Edition 
Farming Simulator 17 - Challenger MT700E Field Viper 
Farming Simulator 17 - Platinum Expansion (DLC) 
Farming Simulator 17 - ROPA Pack.

How to install : 

Mount the iso
Install
Play
